statements: UPDATE RecruitmentData SET status = 'Shortlisted' WHERE candidate_id = 1;
UPDATE RecruitmentData SET hiring_manager = 'John Doe', interview_date = '2022-09-15', experience_years = 5 WHERE candidate_id = 2;
UPDATE RecruitmentData SET status='Completed', interview_date='2022-10-15' WHERE candidate_id=1;
UPDATE RecruitmentData SET hiring_manager='John Doe', job_title='Senior Developer', application_source='Referral', experience_years=5 WHERE candidate_id=2;
UPDATE RecruitmentData SET recruitment_stage = 'Technical Interview' WHERE id = 1001;
UPDATE InterviewFeedback SET overall_rating = 4, feedback_text = 'Great candidate with a lot of potential' WHERE interviewer_name = 'John Doe';
UPDATE RecruitmentData SET application_date = '2022-01-15', recruitment_stage = 'Interview Scheduled' WHERE id = 1;

UPDATE InterviewFeedback SET feedback_text = 'Candidate demonstrated excellent communication skills and problem-solving abilities. Overall, a great fit for the role.', overall_rating = 4 WHERE candidate_name = 'Alice' AND interviewer_name = 'Bob';
UPDATE recruitment_data SET application_status = 'Rejected' WHERE candidate_id = 101;
UPDATE hiring_feedback SET overall_rating = 4, feedback_notes = 'Good communication skills' WHERE candidate_id = 201;
UPDATE recruitment_data SET application_status = 'Accepted' WHERE candidate_id = 101
UPDATE interview_schedule SET interview_result = 'Pass', interviewer_name = 'John Doe' WHERE candidate_id = 101
UPDATE RecruitmentData SET feedback = 'Good candidate. Recommend for next round' WHERE id = 123;
UPDATE InterviewFeedback SET feedback_details = 'Detailed feedback provided by the interview panel' WHERE applicant_id = 456;
UPDATE RecruitmentData SET feedback = 'Excellent candidate, highly recommended' WHERE id = 123;
UPDATE InterviewSchedule SET interviewer_name = 'John Doe', interview_duration = '2 hours' WHERE id = 456;
UPDATE recruitment_data SET interview_status = 'Scheduled' WHERE candidate_name = 'Alice'
UPDATE candidate_skills SET proficiency_level = 'Expert', experience_years = 5 WHERE candidate_id = 1
UPDATE recruitment_data SET interview_status = 'Scheduled' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE interview_feedback SET rating = 4, feedback = 'Impressive communication skills' WHERE interview_id = 101;
